metadata.title: CVE-2023-36268 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description: An issue in The Document Foundation Libreoffice v.7.4.7 allows a remoteattacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted .ppt file.

criterions.comment: libreoffice package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
